scripts.watch: concurrently -c gray,blue -n tailwind,hugo "npm run watch --workspace tailwind" "npm run watch --workspace hugo"
scripts.watch:gitpod: concurrently -c gray,blue -k -n hugo "npm run watch:gitpod --workspace hugo" "npm run watch --workspace tailwind"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf public && npm run clean --workspaces
